name: Ka'awali'i Gulch
description:
Introduction

The information on this page is entirely inferred by reading other people's accounts and is not first-hand.

Approach

Descent

R1: scenic 50' into a pool

R2: not-scenic 65'

R3: 150' angled LDC to a ledge, avoiding keeper pothole ("doom room") with 20' overhang

R4: 190' ledgy chute shortly after R3

R5: final drop LDC of watercourse

Exit

Red tape

Beta sites

  • CanyonChronicles.com : Ka’awali’i Gulch

Trip reports and media

Background
